mapper.select: select t0.*, t1.eval_count from t_shop t0 left outer join (select shop_id, count(0) as eval_count from t_evaluate group by shop_id) t1 on t1.shop_id = t0.id where t0.user_id = #{userId}
select t0.*, t2.parent_id as province_id from t_shop t0 left outer join t_city t2 on t2.id = t0.city_id where t0.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_shop SET user_id = #{userId}, shop_name =#{shopName}, city_id = #{cityId}, type_code = #{typeCode}, pos_count = #{posCount}, per_pay = #{perPay}, space_size = #{spaceSize}, update_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_shop ( user_id, shop_name, city_id, type_code, pos_count, per_pay, space_size, create_date, update_date ) values ( #{userId}, #{shopName}, #{cityId}, #{typeCode}, #{posCount}, #{perPay}, #{spaceSize}, now(), now() )
